turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I need you to go pick up my Starbucks from the downtown Atlanta store before the late night meeting tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want an Iced Black and White Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take a grande please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of Milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any other special requests with the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make sure its real milk, not soy or coconut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what is the address for the Starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It is the one on Peachtree Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have the full address so I do not get lost

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is 100 Peachtree Street Northwest

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do they have a phone number so I can call in the order while on the way.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time do they close?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They close at 9pm, I really need a drink for the late night meeting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will make sure I am there before closing time. Thanks boss.
